TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INamingContainer

summary.span: 标识在 对象的控件层次结构内创建新 ID 命名空间的容器控件。

span.span: Identifies a container control that creates a new ID namespace within a object's control hierarchy.
This is a marker interface only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此接口的任何控件创建一个在其所有子控件 ID 特性都保证在整个应用程序中是唯一的新命名空间。Any control that implements this interface creates a new namespace in which all child control ID attributes are guaranteed to be unique within an entire application. 此接口提供的标记允许支持数据绑定的 Web 服务器控件中的动态生成的服务器控件实例的唯一命名。The marker provided by this interface allows unique naming of the dynamically generated server control instances within the Web server controls that support data binding. 这些控件包括， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和控件。These controls include the , , , , , , , , and controls. 当你开发模板化控件时，应实现此接口可避免命名冲突在页面上。When you develop templated controls, you should implement this interface to avoid naming conflicts on a page. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件设计器概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d5a99d7-0a72-403e-812e-2c1ab595c810)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Control Designers Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d5a99d7-0a72-403e-812e-2c1ab595c810). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现的模板化的自定义服务器控件接口。The following code example demonstrates a templated custom server control that implements the interface. 当在一个.aspx 文件中使用此自定义服务器控件时，它将为它包含所有服务器控件提供唯一的命名空间。When this custom server control is used in an .aspx file, it will provide a unique namespace for any server controls that it contains. [!code-csharp[TemplatedDataBoundControl -- RepeaterItem to compile with#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplatedDataBoundControl -- RepeaterItem to compile with/CS/repeateritem.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TemplatedDataBoundControl -- RepeaterItem to compile with#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplatedDataBoundControl -- RepeaterItem to compile with/VB/repeateritem.vb#1)]
